```{r}
#DATOS DE EJEMPLO ggplot2:
data<- data.frame (
  x=c(1,2,3,4,5),
  y= c(3,5,2,8,7))
#graficos de dispercion
ggplot(data,aes(x=x, y=y))+
  geom_point()+
  labs(title ="graficos de dispercion",x= "Eje x", y="Eje y")
```
